name: Mario & Luigi: Starlight Island Adventure
overview: Mario & Luigi: Starlight Island Adventure is a total revamp and reworking of Super Mario Starlight Remix. It is essentially what that hack would've been had I made it with my current hacking skills and all the resources that have come along since 2006. This 44-level hack includes: * Custom hand-drawn graphics * Custom music * Custom sprites * Custom blocks * ASM hacks
